question:
Louise is three times as old as Mary. Mary is twice as old as Natalie. If Louise is L years old, what is the average (arithmetic mean) age of the three women, in terms of L?
(A) \(\frac{L}{3}\)
(B) \(\frac{L}{2}\)
(C) \(\frac{2L}{3}\)
(D) \(\frac{L}{4}\)
(E) \(\frac{L}{6}\)
